name: Hotel Blues
description:
Here it is, Hotel Blues. (The 3rd Unity Game I've ever made.)

I made that game in a matter of Weeks, so if it sucks, than that's why.

This game that you'll play is not the game that I wanted to make, or envisioned of making in the first place. The "Hotel Blues" game I have planned in my head is much larger then this "Hotel Blues", but at least I tried my best to create a slightly entertaining, short game.

The Story you might ask? Well, you'll have to uncover that yourself.
